titleHeroHome: Discover the universe of Côté Campagne
contentSection1Home:
Sometimes, pictures are better than long speeches
If you want to see more of the organizations that Côté Campagne offers, I invite you to visit my image gallery or my instagram.
contentSection2Home:
Wedding planner, private event organizer and certified floral designer, I will be delighted to accompany you in the development of your project. 

I organize all types of private events, I also accompany you in the preparation and interpretation of your ceremony thanks to my activity of personalized and secular ceremony officiant. 

I like to share my passion for plants around a floral art workshop at your home or at my "Concept store" in the heart of the Limousin countryside in Bersac sur Rivalier or in a more professional way I accompany you to obtain a certification as a florist at the Saint Jean high school in Limoges. 

I am also a practitioner of art therapy, a new and trendy method of personal development. I will accompany you and help you to overcome your daily worries thanks to different artistic mediums. I look forward to meeting you and writing the next page of the Côté Campagne adventure book together.
cardContent1: Trained in the event industry, I respect a rigorous working method
cardTitleContent2: An organization faithful to your desires
cardContent2: Listening to you to organize an event that resembles you is my credo. Every detail is important and nothing will be left to chance.
cardContent3: I work with you to develop a detailed budget that meets your needs and expectations.

about_section:
My name is Estelle, I am 28 years old and I have been a florist for more than 10 years. Passionate about my job I like to to accompany you in the elaboration of your floral scenography with devotion and happiness. From year to year I have built around me a group of serious, passionate and passionate which allows me to propose you a complete organization of all your private events with the rigor, the expertise and know-how of French craftsmanship. I am also trained to organize and officiate your secular ceremonies, I accompany you from A to Z on the preparation preparation and realization of your personalized ceremony. Joy, laughter, love and emotions are the during this warm moment that I share with you. The sharing of my passions and the well-being of my clients are important values for me, so it is so It is therefore with pleasure that I welcome you for leisure floral art workshops at home or in my Concept store" in Bersac sur Rivier in the heart of the Limousin countryside. With a diploma of Art Therapy Practitioner, I help you to evacuate your daily worries during a I help you to evacuate your daily worries during a discovery, initiation or deepened session by using various artistic mediums. (Photography, painting, drawing, watercolor ...). This method of personal development is for me the means to help you and to transmit my benevolence and my energy to you and my energy to help you feel better. My role is also to accompany you during the more painful trials of your life, in fact I flowers and officiate at farewell ceremonies, to pay a last tribute to your loved one. Discreet and passionate about my job and my activities of organization and personal development, I will be I will be delighted to accompany you for all the events of your life. Finally, if you are interested in the profession of florist, I will be happy to give you the professional professional basics through my activity as a trainer in botany, floral art, professional technology and sales at the Lycée Saint jean in Limoges.
See you soon for new adventures!
successRegisterLabel: An email has been sent to you to confirm your account.
contentSectionWedding1:
You have decided to get married soon but you don't know where to start? What if you need help in organizing the most beautiful day of your life? your life? During my 7 years of experience in the event industry, I have built up a team of trustworthy, quality a team of trustworthy, quality and serious partners who the same values of rigor, requirement and passion that I personally apply in my I personally apply in my company. Before being an event organizer, I am a craftsman and I attach particular and I attach particular importance to the quality of my services and confections, while taking care of the respect of our environment. Thanks to this solid network, I can offer you turnkey or à la carte solutions or à la carte solutions for the organization of your beautiful day.
Whether you want me to take care of the whole organization or you simply need a or that you simply need a help in the preparation or even just a presence to take just a presence to take over on the big day.
I have the formula that I have the formula which corresponds to your desires and your budget.
contentCeremonyWeddingPlanner: The secular ceremony is now established in France for several years. The wish today of the future bride and groom is to be proposed a strong symbolic ceremony, which is an alternative to the traditional religious ceremony or which comes to supplement this last one, but it is especially, a celebration which forms the culminating point of the commitment of the married couple after the civil union. That's why I write a personalized ceremony, filled with emotion, laughter and sharing. As a lay ceremony officiant, my role is to amaze and move you. Your ceremony is your moment! Imagined for you. I am a certified ceremony officiant for several years, I organize this moment with you and in your image. If you have no idea where this unforgettable moment will take place, I will be able to advise you a place which resembles you (On the sand, in a garden, in a forest, entrance of a castle...)
titleCeremonyOfficiant: What does an officiant of a secular ceremony do ?
contentCeremonyOfficiant:
I will put all my experience at your service to write a ceremony to your image.
The secular ceremony is a different ceremony, neither religious nor civil, this ceremony just allows you to proclaim your love.

The laic ceremony transports you in an idyllic setting. You can exchange your vows and commitments, and make this moment unique with your family and friends.
Your family and friends will also be able to reinforce this moment of emotion, by their speech and attentions.

HUMOR, EMOTION AND COMMITMENTS will be the key words of this unforgettable day!

titleFormReview: What was your experience with Côté Campagne
contentFloralDesign1:
The essence of my company created 8 years ago is to
is to offer you personalized floral arrangements for all the
occasions of your life.
contentFloralDesign2:
I give a particular importance to the personalization of these
arrangements according to your tastes, your desires and your
your budget.
contentFloralDesign3:
Trained to be an Eco-boss, I am vigilant about the origin of my plants, the respect
plants, the respect of seasonality as well as the sorting and recycling
of my waste.
contentFloralDesign4:
Each floral realization is studied and realized with heart, it is for
why it is preferable to place an order at least 1 week before the
delivery to benefit from a custom order.
(Delays even more important for the great achievements or projects
projects).
contentFloralDesign5:
I deliver to your home, to the place of your event or you can pick up your order
you can pick up your order at the Concept store Côté campagne in
Bersac sur rivalier.
contentSectionWedding2:
The first appointment is free and without obligation:
We get to know each other, we define together we define together the broad outlines of your needs so that I can prepare a personalized so that I can prepare a personalized estimate.
You receive a few days later the estimate that we have established together
Following the signature of the estimate, the serious steps begin!
subscriptionContent:
Do you want to offer yourself a beautiful bouquet to bring the plant world
into your home? Or you want to offer regularly a floral present
to a relative living near Limoges?
Think subscription, several formulas are available.
HowWorkContent1:
Depending on the package you choose, you will receive a bouquet every month
or every 2 months or every 3 months. This bouquet is available in
at the concept store in Bersac sur Rivier or by delivery (+ travel expenses).
travel expenses).
HowWorkContent2:
Seasonal flowers, free creation according to the inspiration of the month.
You can choose to pick it up or have it delivered to a loved one.
price1:
1 year: 1 package per month or 12 packages €30/month (package worth €40 available every month).
value of 40€ available every month).
price2:
1 year : 1 bouquet every 2 months or 6 bouquets per year 16€/month one
bouquet every 2 months available (bouquet worth 40€).
price3:
1 an : 1 bouquet tous les 3 mois soit 4 bouquets par an 12€/mois 1
bouquet tous les 3 mois (valeur du bouquet disponible 40€)
price4:
6 months: 1 bouquet per month, i.e. 6 bouquets
35€/month : 1 bouquet worth 40€ available per month.
price5:
6 months: 1 bouquet every two months, i.e. 3 bouquets 18€/month: 1
bouquet worth 40€ every 2 months.
moreInfoPrices:
If you want to adapt your subscription do not hesitate to contact me
to identify your needs, your constraints...
workShopContent1: During this floral workshop you will discover the basics of composition and bouquet of cut flowers and/or composition of rooted plants. I will adapt the theme of the class to your tastes and desires of the moment while respecting your favorite color codes and seasonality.  Trained in eco-friendly techniques, I would be delighted to pass on these new techniques that are more respectful of the environment.
workShopContent2: I also intervene in schools, retirement homes, companies and associations to create trendy floral arrangements for groups.
workShopContent3: You will leave with your composition, material and plants provided.  Travel expenses are not included in the price of the workshop.
privateLessonsContent1: Initiation, learning the basics of floristry, small simple arrangement. 1H
privateLessonContent2: Discovery of more complex techniques, medium size arrangement. 2H
privateWorkShopContent1: Learn the basic techniques while enjoying the camaraderie of a group.
privateWorkShopContent2: With friends or on a date planned by Côté campagne, discover more complex techniques and make an arrangement while taking advantage of the group dynamics.
privateWorkShopContent3: Let your creativity explode by making complex arrangements, step by step you will learn to make a remarkable floral piece.
offerCourse: Offers available to follow my courses:
offerWorkShop: Offers available to follow my workshops:
workShopContent4: Art therapy is a method of personal development aiming at making you evacuate and overcome the worries of the everyday life which prevents you from advancing: Management of stress and anxieties, lack of self-confidence, lack of self-esteem, mourning, isolation, depression, illness, addictions... Thanks to the different artistic mediums, free yourself and reconnect with yourself during the different sessions offered.
privateArtTherapyContent1: An external service provider enters the therapy process (photographer, baker, seamstress ....) and the session is focused on a major concern.
privateArtTherapyContent2: In a group, discover art therapy and take advantage of the group dynamic to share your experiences and open up to others.
privateArtTherapyContent3: Working on the same problem, the exchange energizes the search for solutions and galvanizes creativity.
privateArtTherapyContent4: You want to live a new experience while being carried by the friendly atmosphere of the group this session is made for you.
privateArtTherapyContent5: You want to live a new experience while being carried by the friendly atmosphere of the group this session is made for you.

You've been waiting for this day for a long time and you want everything to to your image. Don't panic, I'm here to: welcome your guests, manage the service providers providers, make sure the timing is respected, manage the photo session and the groups, pay the providers and manage the small unforeseen events. I take over so that you can fully enjoy your loved ones. loved ones.
contentD-DayOfficiant:
I officiate the ceremony on the day + 1 meeting before the ceremony
ceremony to review the text and requirements.
contentPartialOrganization: I help you to finalize the implementation of your ideas, advise you on the decoration, the choice of the rituals and I officiate the D-day.
contentTotalOrganization: From the preparation of the ceremony to the writing of the texts, including the decoration, the choice of rituals, the planning of the speakers and the service on the D-day.
title_evjg_section: Are you looking to organize an unforgettable day for your friend who is getting married getting married soon?
content_evjg_section:
I have the solution for you! By calling upon my organization services!
I offer you a tailor-made solution to make this day unforgettable.
Your friend likes thrills? Video games? Outdoor or indoor sports?
I have the turnkey formula that suits him!
Without forgetting the aperitif and the festive evening, you don't have to worry about anything, you can simply ENJOY !
My network of partners allows me to make you benefit from benefits and additional options especially for you.
